resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
According to https://endoflife.date/macos (and also Wikipedia), macOS Mavericks has been unsupported since 2016 but our CI is still producing wheels for it.

In addition, we are still producing wheels for High Sierra, which is also unsupported. However, if we stop producing them, then Catalina users will not be able to install PyArrow wheels anymore.
